note.p: Clergyman and schoolmaster. BA, Cambridge (Emmanuel College), 1858. Ordained deacon, Armagh, 1862; priest, 1863. Assistant master, Lincoln Grammar School, 1859–60; Royal School, Armagh, 1860–5. Second master, Oakham School, Rutland, 1865–72. Head master, Rishworth Grammar School, 1875–8. Vicar of Bonby, Lincolnshire, 1878–84.
